articles.title: 5 children removed from family home after allegedly being locked in cages
articles.description: 5 children removed from family home after allegedly being locked in cages go.com
articles.content:
Five children have been removed from their home after it was discovered that their mother and grandparents had allegedly kept them locked in cages for an undetermined amount of time.

articles.title: Flames apparently shooting from engine force jet to return to Newark
articles.description: A cross-country flight was forced to return to Newark Airport minutes after takeoff due to a mechanical problem that appeared to result in flames shooting from an engine.
articles.content:
A United Airlines flight from Newark to Los Angeles was forced to return to the airport minutes after takeoff due to a mechanical problem that apparently resulted in flames shooting from one of its engines.
A passenger aboard United Airlines Flight 1871 capt… [+702 chars]

articles.title: UN body welcomes 'milestone' in Qatar labor reforms
articles.description: The U.N. labor organization says Qatar has abolished exit visa requirements for virtually all migrant workers
articles.content:
DUBAI, United Arab Emirates -- 
The U.N. labor organization said Thursday that Qatar has abolished exit visa requirements for virtually all migrant workers, hailing the move as a milestone in reform efforts ahead of the 2022 FIFA World Cup.

articles.author: KELVIN CHAN Associated Press
articles.title: UK police use of facial recognition tests public's tolerance
articles.description: Some soccer fans attending a recent match in Britain covered up their faces to protest the local police force's use of facial recognition cameras to monitor arriving crowds
articles.content:
LONDON -- 
When British police used facial recognition cameras to monitor crowds arriving for a soccer match in Wales, some fans protested by covering their faces. In a sign of the technologys divisiveness, even the head of a neighboring police force said he… [+6641 chars]

articles.title: Taliban say they handed cease-fire offer to US peace envoy
articles.description: The Taliban say they have given the U.S. envoy a document outlining their offer for a temporary cease-fire in Afghanistan that would last between seven and 10 days
articles.content:
ISLAMABAD -- 
The Taliban have given the U.S. envoy a document outlining their offer for a temporary cease-fire in Afghanistan that would last between seven and 10 days, Taliban officials familiar with the negotiations said Thursday.

articles.title: Senate to accept articles Thursday as Trump impeachment trial set to begin
articles.description: The Senate is expected to officially accept the articles of impeachment Thursday.
articles.content:
The Senate is expected to officially accept the articles of impeachment Thursday, after they were handed off by key members of the House late Wednesday, officially triggering the third presidential impeachment trial in presidential history.
